name: AssociateTestMethodsWithTestCases
description: An Azure DevOps task which manages the associations between Test Methods (code) and Test Cases (Azure DevOps).
author: QNH-Consulting-BV
instanceNameFormat: Manages Test Methods - Test Cases associations

inputs.name: SourceFolder
inputs.label: Source folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The source folder used to execute the tool on.

inputs.name: MinimatchPatterns
inputs.label: Minimatch patterns
inputs.helpMarkDown: Minimatch patterns to search for within the source folder, separated by a semicolon.

inputs.name: CollectionUri
inputs.label: Collection Uri
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Azure DevOps collection Uri used for accessing the project work items.

inputs.name: PersonalAccesstoken
inputs.label: Personal Access token
inputs.helpMarkDown: The personal access token used for accessing the Azure DevOps project.

inputs.name: ProjectName
inputs.label: Project name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project name containing the test plan.

inputs.name: TestPlanName
inputs.label: Test plan name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the test plan containing the test cases.

inputs.name: ValidateOnly
inputs.label: Validate only
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicate if you only want to validate the changes without saving the work item.

inputs.name: VerboseLogging
inputs.label: Verbose logging
inputs.helpMarkDown: When turned on it also outputs the successful matchings next to the warnings.
